poem:
**Pierce**

In the cold silver darkness,
questions arise—
the flicker of a bullet
or the whisper of air?

Ears tuned
to the breath of metal,
while the house stands,
tasked with unraveling shadows 
that skirt the edge
of flesh and truth.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "FBI director questions whether Trump was hit by bullet; Obama reportedly expected to endorse Harris soon – US politics live 3.58pm BST The House has put together a bipartisan taskforce to investigate the assassination attempt against Donald Trump, the Associated Press reports. Perhaps that will get to the bottom of what hit his ear: The House voted on Wednesday to form a taskforce to investigate the security failures surrounding the assassination attempt against Donald Trump". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: FBI director questions whether Trump was hit by bullet; Obama reportedly expected to endorse Harris soon – US politics live 3.58pm BST The House has put together a bipartisan taskforce to investigate the assassination attempt against Donald Trump, the Associated Press reports. Perhaps that will get to the bottom of what hit his ear: The House voted on Wednesday to form a taskforce to investigate the security failures surrounding the assassination attempt against Donald Trump
